department.dept_long_name: Department of Romance Languages and Literatures

course.title: Beginning Portuguese for Spanish Speakers II
course.meeting_text: M., W., F., at 11 am, 12 or 1 pm
course.faculty_text: Viviane Gontijo and members of the Department
course.description: A continuation of Portuguese Ac. By the end of the second term, students should be able to communicate easily with native speakers and be acquainted with basic elements of Luso-Brazilian culture.
course.prerequisites: Portuguese Ac or permission of course head.
course.notes: Conducted in Portuguese. May not be taken Pass/Fail, but may be taken Sat/Unsat by GSAS students. Not open to auditors. Section on-line on the Portuguese Ad website.
